targets.query: SELECT last("memory_max") - last("memory_used") FROM "memory_usage" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT "i_UserName" as "用户名","j_ProcessName" as "进程名","k_PID" as "PID","l_CPU_Percent" as "CPU","m_MEM_Percent" as "内存","n_Exec" as "命令行" FROM Processes_List where $timeFilter AND Host=~/^$Host$/ 
 AND Host_Name=~/^$Host_Name$/ AND (l_CPU_Percent!=0 or m_MEM_Percent!=0) GROUP BY "Host"::tag
SELECT "j_Partition_Name" as "分区", "o_Used_Percent" as "当前使用率" FROM "Disk_Usage" WHERE "Host"::tag =~ /^$Host$/ AND "Host_Name"::tag =~ /^$Host_Name$/ AND time > now() - 1m

SELECT last("l_Disk_Used") / last("k_Disk_Max") * 100 FROM "Disk_Usage" WHERE ("Host"::tag =~ /^$Host$/ AND "i_Partition_Name"::tag =~ /^$Partition_Name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT "j_Name" as "网站名称","k_Port" as "网站端口","m_Http_Code" as "Http_Code","n_Response_Time" as "响应时间" FROM "Web_Status" WHERE time > now() - 1m AND "Host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "Host_Name" =~ /^$Host_Name$/
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT "j_Name" as "业务名称","k_Comment" as "业务描述","l_Value" as "当前数据量","m_Unit" as "数据单位" FROM "Business_Data" WHERE time > now() - 1h AND "Host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "Host_Name" =~ /^$Host_Name$/

list.definition: select distinct("j_Name") from Web_Status where time > now() - 2m
list.label: 网站
list.name: Web_Name
